mapper.insert: insert into weizu_location( user_id, latitude, longitude, location_info, app_id, create_time ) values ( #{userId}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{locationInfo}, #{appId}, now() )
mapper.select: select la.id as id, la.latitude as latitude, CONCAT(wu.nick_name, DATE_FORMAT(la.create_time,'_%Y-%m-%d-%H:%i:%s')) as name, la.longitude as longitude, wu.avatar_url as iconPath from weizu_location la left join weizu_user wu on la.user_id=wu.id where la.id in(select max(id) from weizu_location where create_time > date_sub(now(), interval 1 day) group by user_id) and la.app_id = #{id}
